srcEncryptedKey.title: Encrypted Key Source Field
srcEncryptedKey.description: Field which contains the Encrypted Key

srcEncryptedValue.title: Encrypted Value Source Field
srcEncryptedValue.description: Field which contains the Encrypted Value

dstDecryptedKey.title: Decrypted Key Destination Field
dstDecryptedKey.description: Field name where the Decrypted Key will be placed.

dstDecryptedValue.title: Decrypted Value Destination Field
dstDecryptedValue.description: Field name where the Decrypted Value will be placed.

azureVaultName.title: Azure Vault Name
azureVaultName.description: The name of the Azure Vault, where the key resides.

azureKeyName.title: Azure Key Name
azureKeyName.description: The name of the Azure Key to use with decrypting.
